sentences.en: Acting is definitely a young person's profession in many ways.
sentences.cn: 从许多方面来说，表演无疑是吃青春饭的行当。

sentences.en: Everything about the film was good. Good acting, good story, good fun.
sentences.cn: 这部片子各个方面都很不错：表演出色，故事精彩，情节有趣。

sentences.en: For years the teaching of acting has been shrouded in mystery.
sentences.cn: 多年以来表演教学一直蒙着神秘的面纱。

sentences.en: He was accused of acting as a carrier for drug pushers.
sentences.cn: 他被指控为一些毒贩运毒。

sentences.en: Her mother started her off acting in children's theatre.
sentences.cn: 她母亲先是让她在儿童剧院里演出。

sentences.en: Learning lines is very easy. Acting is very difficult.
sentences.cn: 记台词很容易。表演很难。

sentences.en: Men fantasise as a substitute for acting out forbidden desires.
sentences.cn: 人类通过幻想宣泄压抑的欲望。

sentences.en: Several tennis stars have had a stab at acting.
sentences.cn: 好几位网球明星都尝试过从事演艺。

sentences.en: She eventually decided the acting profession wasn't half bad.
sentences.cn: 她最终断定，表演这一行并不适合。

sentences.en: She had come to England to pursue an acting career.
sentences.cn: 她来英格兰投身演艺事业。

sentences.en: She was messing with the coffee pot, which was acting up again.
sentences.cn: 她正在鼓捣咖啡壶，那壶又坏了。

sentences.en: She worked as a stripper and did some acting.
sentences.cn: 她以跳脱衣舞为职业，有时也演些戏。

sentences.en: The new acting president has a reputation of being someone who is independent.
sentences.cn: 这位新的临时代理总裁有极有主见的名声。

sentences.en: The president insisted that he was acting out of compassion, not opportunism.
sentences.cn: 总统坚持说他如此做是出于同情而不是为了投机。

sentences.en: To keep it going, Lenoire kicked in her own earnings from acting.
sentences.cn: 为了使它继续下去，勒努瓦捐出了自己演戏挣的钱。

sentences.en: When are you going to quit acting like a martyr?
sentences.cn: 你什么时候才能不再摆出一副可怜样？

words.tran_cn: 行为，行动；法令，法案；（戏剧，歌剧的）一幕，段；装腔作势
行动；扮演，充当；表现，举止；假装，演戏；起作用，见效

phrases.tran_cn: 把…表演出来；把…付诸行动
[古语]即将，正要(与to和不定式连用)

trans.tran_en: You use acting before the title of a job to indicate that someone is doing that job temporarily
the job or skill of performing in plays and films

trans.tran_cn: 行动，举止，假装，扮演，起作用（act的现在分词）
